donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: A policy facility is a real or virtual cluster of resource-persons drawn from various UN agencies that serves as a cutting-edge repository of policy advice, research, a hub for creating and maintaining networks and community of practice of expert practitioners. It could serve as a valuable UN offer to the government.  It is characterized as being innovative, fast, nimble and responsive to the needs of the government. The policy facility will operate along two lines: a) provide a menu of well-analysed policy options where the government asks the UN for assistance; and b) it will scan the horizon and pro-actively offer options to the government on emerging and just-over-the-horizon issues. It is intended to work on meta-thematic issues and complements the already prevalent excellent policy advice that individual members of the UNCT provide on particularly sector/thematic/project specific issues. To that end it is envisaged as a sum of the parts that adds up to a bigger whole.
